title: Wright Brothers National Memorial: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Wright Brothers National Memorial is open seven days a week, year-round, 9 amâ€“5 pm. The only day the park is closed is Christmas Day, December 25. Check our calendar or the latest issue of In the Park, the park newspaper, to plan your visit.
